title: Create emerging insights tracking
description: Implement system to identify and track emerging project types, new template requirements, and workflow improvements based on pattern analysis. Include confidence scoring and recommendation generation.
notes: Guides future template and system development. Created comprehensive tracking system for emerging patterns and template evolution.
completion_notes: Created emerging-patterns.md for tracking new project types, hybrid patterns, and technology trends. Also created template-evolution.md documenting the full lifecycle of templates from pattern detection through retirement. Both files include confidence scoring, validation criteria, and recommendation generation frameworks.
